meanings.sent1: She sat quietly among her friends at the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The red apple was hidden among the green ones.
meanings.sent3: The cat found itself among a group of curious puppies.
meanings.sent4: His voice stood out among the chatter of the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The lone flower bloomed brightly among the weeds.

meanings.definition: Included in a group or set
meanings.sent1: He was happy to be among the chosen few for the project.
meanings.sent2: The blue marble was among the collection of toys.
meanings.sent3: The shy kitten was among the playful littermates.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was among the best in the art exhibition.
meanings.sent5: The rare stamp was among the valuable items in the collection.

meanings.sent1: The old castle was nestled among the tall trees.
meanings.sent2: The cozy cabin was hidden among the snow-covered mountains.
meanings.sent3: The tiny island was among the vast ocean waves.
meanings.sent4: The small village was among the rolling hills.
meanings.sent5: The bright moon shone among the twinkling stars.
